markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

</column>

---

By adopting _resonant reflections_, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well. When you use [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10) on a foe within 100 feet, you gain resistance 10 to all damage types that target has resistance or immunity to for as long as the foe remains within 100 feet.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs.

**Related Feats**: [Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240), [Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241), [Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247), [Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250), [Verdant Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1251)
name: Mimic Protections
